title: Jimmy Carter has died
author: gkolli
aiHeadline: Breaking News: Jimmy Carter, the 39th President of the United States, Has Left the Building, Leaving Behind a Legacy of Peanut Butter and Good Deeds, But Let's Be Real, Most of You Were Probably Thinking 'Wait, He Was Still Alive?'

title: 38C3: Illegal Instructions
author: type0
aiHeadline: Get Ready to Level Up Your Geek Cred: The 38C3 Conference is Live, Featuring Talks on Illegal Instructions, Because Who Needs Rules Anyway, and We're Pretty Sure the Presenters Won't Get in Trouble for Sharing Their Secrets

title: WebGL Fluid Simulation
author: ChadNauseam
aiHeadline: Warning: The WebGL Fluid Simulation Website May Cause Excessive Oohing and Aahing, as Well as a Strong Urge to Play with Virtual Water and Forget About All Your Adult Responsibilities, So Proceed with Caution (and a Full Battery)

title: We've not been trained for this: life after the Newag DRM disclosure [video]
author: doener
aiHeadline: The Drama Continues: 'We've Not Been Trained for This' is the Battle Cry of the New Age, as Experts Scramble to Deal with the Fallout from the Newag DRM Disclosure, Because Who Needs a Plan When You Can Just Wing It and Hope for the Best?

title: Jeju Air Jet Crashes in South Korea With Over 170 Dead or Missing
author: toomuchtodo
aiHeadline: Tragedy Strikes in South Korea: A Jeju Air Jet Has Crashed, Leaving Over 170 People Dead or Missing, and We're Reminded Once Again of the Fragility of Life and the Importance of Checking Your Flight Status Before Boarding, But Let's Take a Moment to Appreciate the Miracle of Air Travel and the Brave Men and Women Who Keep Us Safe in the Skies
